languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} 5 heavy-loaded torpedo salvos with melta warheads. Each torpedo deals 50 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 18 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Heavy-loaded torpedoes sacrifices most of onboard cohitators and fuel reserves in favor of carrying larger warhead.They can't be guided beyong initial course selection and has only 2 round lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Fires 5 heavy-loaded torpedo salvos with melta warheads. Each torpedo deals 50 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 18 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Heavy-loaded torpedoes sacrifices most of onboard cohitators and fuel reserves in favor of carrying larger warhead.They can't be guided beyong initial course selection and has only 2 round lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>
